publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2876 Mr Andrew Arbuckle on behalf of the Baird Trust Reorganisation Bill Committee: Baird Trust Reorganisation Bill—That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Baird Trust Reorganisation Bill and that the Bill should proceed as a Private Bill.

S2M-2876 Mr Andrew Arbuckle on behalf of the Baird Trust Reorganisation Bill Committee:Baird Trust Reorganisation Bill—That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Baird Trust Reorganisation Bill and that the Bill should proceed as a Private Bill.
